text: Jala diulahon do sogo ni roha ni Jahowa, sai diihutihut do dalan ni amana dohot inana, diihutihut huhut dalan ni si Jerobeam, anak ni si Nebat, na mangela Israel mambahen dosa. (22-54) Dioloi ibana huhut Baal, jala marsomba tusi, asa pahehe muruk ni Jahowa, Debata ni Israel, sandok suang songon na binahen ni amana i.
